entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 6:00 AM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023
Temperature: 4.2°C
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: SW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 10 except 14 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High 10 except 14 along parts of the coast. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. A few showers beginning late this evening. Flurries over higher terrain before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers except flurries over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 5 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023
